import.title: Import NFT
import.description: Import your NFT from the source chain.

scan_screen.title: Scan for NFT
scan_screen.description: Don't see your NFTs? Try adding them manually!

tx.title: Approval sent
tx.message: Track {token} token approval status on the explorer here.

success.title: Approved token
success.message: You can now proceed to bridge {token}.

tx.title: Transaction sent
tx.message: Track the bridge status of your {token} here.

success.title: Transaction completed
success.message: Your funds are being prepared for claiming on Taiko.

errors.insufficient_balance: Not enough balance in your wallet for this token.
errors.insufficient_allowance: You need to increase your allowance in order to be able to bridge.
errors.bll_token: BLL has a deliberate ~50% failure rate. Refer to our guide

custom_token.description: Are you on the right network?

recipient.title: Recipient address
recipient.description: You can set a custom address as the recipient of your funds, instead of your current wallet address.
recipient.tooltip: Defaults to your address. You can add a custom recipient address as well.

processing_fee.title: Processing fee
processing_fee.description: The payment you provide to the relayer for handling your bridge message on the destination chain.
processing_fee.tooltip: The payment you provide to the relayer for handling your bridge message on the destination chain.

none.label: None
none.text: Use ETH to manually claim your bridged token later
none.warning: Insufficient ETH to cover the gas fees for claiming.

processing.name: Processing
processing.description: Transaction is processing. Depending on the pending blocks to be verified this can take up to several minutes.

pending.name: Pending
pending.description: Your asset is not yet eligible for claiming. The bridging process from Taiko to Sepolia may take several hours before becoming claimable. Sepolia to Taiko bridging should be claimable within minutes.

claim.name: Claim
claim.description: Your asset is now ready for claiming on the destination chain and requires a transaction. If you have set a processing fee, the relayer will automatically handle the claiming process on your behalf.

claimed.name: Claimed
claimed.description: Your asset has successfully completed the bridging process and is now available to you on the destination chain.

retry.name: Retry
retry.description: The relayer was unable to process this message, and you will need to retry the processing yourself.

release.name: Release
release.description: Your bridged asset cannot be processed and is now accessible to you on the source chain.

dialog.title: Message status
dialog.description: The bridge message undergoes different stages:

tx.title: Transaction sent
tx.message: Track the progress on the explorer here.

success.title: Transaction completed
success.message: Your funds have been successfully claimed on {network}.

dialog.title: Please wait
dialog.description: Insufficient balance to claim yourself. Please wait for the relayer to claim for you automatically. Refer to our guide for more information.

tx.title: Transaction sent
tx.message: Track the progress on the explorer here.

success.title: Transaction completed
success.message: Your funds have been released on {network}

errors.insufficient_balance: Insufficient balance to claim yourself. Please wait for the relayer to claim for you automatically. Refer to our guide for more information.
errors.relayer_offline: Relayer did not respond. Your transactions may only be loaded partially.

tx.title: Transaction sent
tx.message: Track the progress on the explorer here.

success.title: Token minted successfully
success.message: Check your updated balance on the Bridge page.

rejected.title: Error minting token
rejected.message: An error occurred while attempting to mint the token.

wrong_chain.message: It appears you are on the wrong network. Switch to {network} to mint tokens.

warning.no_connected: Please connect your wallet to mint tokens.
warning.insufficient_balance: You don't have enough ETH to complete the transaction. Please add some ETH to your wallet.
warning.token_minted: You have already minted this token.
warning.not_mintable: This token is not mintable on this network

custom_token.title: Add your own token
custom_token.description: You can add your own token by entering the contract address below. Make sure you are on the chain where the token is deployed.

amount.label: Amount
amount.errors.failed_max: Could not estimate max amount to bridge.

disabled_options.title: Disabled options?
disabled_options.description: Some options might be disabled due to not having a valid bridge configuration

switch_modal.title: Incorrect network detected
switch_modal.description: Your current network is not supported. Please select one of the following chains to proceed:

network.pending: A network switch is still pending, open your wallet to check the status.
